item.description:
This is primarily a social opportunity for determined, committed declutterers to meet one another & find compatible decluttering buddies (accountability partners) with whom to work on decluttering our respective spaces and lives in the coming months- to get a jumpstart on New Year's resolutions, perhaps.

We can also talk about strategies, of course- and celebrate our successes, dreams, and goals: whatever you'd like to chat about!

Your ideas for such an event are very welcomed, and anyone is welcomed to head up a series of these socials (offering them for free or for a meeting charge- whatever works better for you) to facilitate connections, so feel free to post comments and ideas here on this page- or start a thread on our Message Board.

Thanks!

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Decluttering Buddies MIXER: Come Find a Decluttering Buddy(ies)!
